mainText:
I don't have many heroes, but I am proud to say that Steve Jobs will always 
 be my hero! He taught me how to dream. He taught me how to live. He taught 
me  passion for life. He taught me how to die! I will always love his 
example of  life!  Praying for his family. May he rest in peace!!!!!!!
header: His Memory Is A Valuable Asset....May He Rest In Peace
author: Lamar
